reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - FOMC minutes released May 22 revealed that several officials expressed a willingness to tighten policy further if inflation risks materialize, shifting market expectations away from imminent rate cuts.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released May 22 revealed that several officials expressed a willingness to tighten policy further if inflation risks materialize, shifting market expectations away from imminent rate cuts.
payload.market_impact: Bullish for USD; Bearish for Gold and commodities due to higher-for-longer interest rate outlook and rising Treasury yields.
